'''''Full Metal What Now?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to shatter the Geo Crystal Shield of a [[Large Geo Slime]].

==Trivia==
* The Achievement name could be a reference to the 1987 war drama film ''{{w|Full Metal Jacket}}'', directed and produced by {{w| Stanley Kubrick}}.
